page.title: 07VILLAGE SHOP
page.content: { { Northend shop}is quite small but it sells over two thousand items.A lot of people use it but only for things that they run out of.In a shed outside they sell,coal,coke and paraffin. There is a big counter full of sweets where children spend their pocket money. The{post office}is part of the shop. Lots of people go round there on Thursday because it's pension day. There is a{tea room}next door which belongs to the shop. Mr.Freeman (the owner) does a lot of jobs in the day.These are:controling the stock,delivering the newspapers and making things dearer. On week days the shop is open from 9:00 till 5:30.On Tuesday it closes at 12:00 and on Sunday at 12:30.
